noun.description: Any region situated beyond mountains, especially (with capital initial) such a region in the Western Cape or in KwaZulu-Natal.

adjective.description: That is situated or comes from beyond a mountain or mountains; from the Overberg.

origin: Early 19th century. From over- + South African Dutch berg berg, after South African Dutch die Overberg, name of a region in the Western Cape. With use as adjective compare South African Dutch overbergsch (Afrikaans Overbergs) of or relating to the Overberg.
